inputs.remark:
SRT 结果："SRT 7 dB (right) and 3 dB (left)"，实际应为 "SRT 10 dB bilaterally"。7 和 3 是 PTA 值，不是 SRT 值。
Peak Pressure 把 -10 改为 10。

logic_summary: Corrected Speech audiometry SRT values from PTA values (7/3 dB) to actual SRT values (10 dB bilaterally) as per the audiogram table.
Corrected Tympanometry Right ear Peak Pressure from -10 daPa to 10 daPa as per the tympanometry table.

patch_ops.value: SRT 10 dB bilaterally; WRS 100% at 50 dB HL bilaterally.
Type A tympanograms bilaterally (Right: 1.0 mL, 0.7 mmho, 10 daPa; Left: 1.1 mL, 0.9 mmho, 0 daPa).
